sentences.sentence: More research might just raise more questions and create more controversies.
sentences.translation: 更多的研究可能只会引发更多问题、制造更多争议。

sentences.sentence: As this new science of habit has emerged, controversies have erupted when the tactics have been used to sell questionable beauty creams or unhealthy foods.
sentences.translation: 随着这种新的习惯科学出现，这些策略被用于销售问题美容霜或不健康食品时引发了争议。
